entry.title: Rickshaw Bicycle
entry.content:
Tom was an average college student with an unusual hobby. He enjoyed inflicting pain and humiliation on his history professor, Jack. Jack was an elderly man who had dedicated his life to teaching, never expecting such treatment from one of his own students. Tom found it thrilling to see the fear and helplessness in Jack’s eyes as he subjected him to degrading tasks.
One sunny afternoon, Tom decided to take his twisted amusement to the next level. He invited Jack to meet him at the campus bike racks. As Jack approached, he noticed a strange contraption waiting for him: a bicycle with a long, sturdy frame and a seat attached to the handlebars. The seat looked like it was designed for someone to sit on with their legs and torso bent forward.
“Professor Jack,” Tom greeted him with a sinister grin, “please have a seat.”
Jack hesitated, but he knew better than to refuse his sadistic student. He carefully lowered himself onto the uncomfortable seat, his back arched painfully and his face inches from the handlebars. Tom secured Jack’s wrists and ankles to the bike’s frame with thick rope.
“Now, Professor,” Tom said, mounting the bicycle behind Jack, “I’m going for a ride.”
With a triumphant laugh, Tom pedaled, and the bike began to move. Jack felt every bump and jolt in his aged body as they weaved through the campus. People stared and gasped, unsure if they were witnessing a bizarre performance art installation or a genuine act of sadism.
As they approached a steep hill, Tom increased the speed, forcing Jack to struggle to keep up. His muscles burned, and his breaths came in ragged gasps. “Faster,” Tom taunted, his voice echoing in Jack’s ear. “You’re not too old to pedal, are you?”
Jack’s face contorted in agony, tears streaming down his cheeks. But he pedaled, driven by the knowledge that if he stopped, the punishment would only intensify.
When they finally reached the top of the hill, Tom slowed down and dismounted the bike. He walked around to stand in front of Jack, admiring his helpless, bent-over form. With a malicious grin, Tom climbed onto the seat attached to the handlebars, straddling Jack’s back like a rider on a horse.
“Ready, Professor?” he asked, his voice a menacing whisper in Jack’s ear.
Jack, broken and defeated, could only nod his head in silent submission.
With a cruel laugh, Tom kicked the pedals, and they were off, hurtling down the steep incline at breakneck speed. The wind whipped through Jack’s hair, and his eyes watered from the force of being dragged behind the bike. People scattered out of their path, screaming in terror as they watched the human-powered rickshaw barreling towards them.
As they neared the bottom of the hill, Tom slowed down, savoring the power and control he held over his helpless teacher. He stopped the bike, and with a triumphant laugh, hopped off, leaving Jack gasping for air and soaked in sweat and humiliation.
With a final, malicious smirk, Tom untied Jack’s restraints and casually strolled away, leaving his professor on the ground, broken and defeated, wondering how he had ever underestimated the depths of his student’s twisted mind.

entry.title: The Professor's Indulgence
entry.content:
Tom, a charming and handsome college student, had always been aware of his good looks. He knew how to use his charm and wit to get what he wanted, whether it was extra credit on an exam or a date with the most desired girl on campus. But there was one person he had set his eyes on for a while now, someone he knew would be the ultimate prize: his middle-aged history professor, Jack.
Jack was a distinguished and respected man in the academic world. With his silver hair and sharp features, he exuded an air of authority and wisdom. His classes were always packed with students who adored him, both male and female alike. But there was something about Tom that captivated him. The way he gazed at him with those piercing green eyes, the way he always seemed to be close, lingering just a little too long after class. Jack tried to brush off the feelings as nothing more than a student crush, but deep down, he knew the truth.
One day, after a particularly intense lecture, Jack found himself alone in his office, grading papers. The door creaked open, and there stood Tom, his perfect features bathed in the soft glow of the desk lamp. Without a word, he closed the distance between them, his eyes burning with desire.
“Professor,” he whispered, his voice low and husky, “I’ve wanted this for so long.”
Jack tried to protest, to push him away, but he couldn’t. Tom’s hands were on him, undoing his buttons and pushing his suit jacket off his shoulders. In seconds, he had him pinned against the wall, his mouth hungrily devouring Jack’s neck.
“Please, Professor,” Tom moaned, his hips grinding against Jack’s. “I need you.”
Jack’s mind reeled with confusion and desire. He knew this was wrong, but his body betrayed him. He gave in, surrendering to the overwhelming sensations coursing through him. Tom was in control, and he relished every moment of it.
As their bodies intertwined, Jack couldn’t help but fantasize about being Tom’s student. Being the one on his knees, begging for the professor’s approval and attention. But this was reality, and in this twisted fantasy, he was the one being taken, being dominated by his student.
Their passionate encounter left them both spent and breathless. Jack struggled to regain his composure, trying desperately to process what had just happened. Tom, however, seemed unapologetic and satisfied.
“I think you enjoyed that, Professor,” he purred, running his fingers teasingly along Jack’s still-erect member. “Don’t deny it.”
Jack couldn’t deny it. The truth was, he had enjoyed it more than he ever thought possible. And deep down, he knew there would be more.
From that day on, their secret trysts became a regular occurrence. Every Tuesday and Thursday, after the last bell rang, they would meet in Jack’s office. Jack would transform into a submissive and willing plaything, eagerly obeying Tom’s every command.
Tom’s fantasies were dark and twisted, and Jack found himself indulging in them, relishing in the power and control he had over his once-respected professor. He would crawl across the floor like a dog, licking Tom’s shoes clean. He would bark like a pet when commanded to do so. And when Tom mounted him, straddling his hips like a horse, Jack would moan and whimper like the filthy, depraved animal he had become.
As the weeks passed, their relationship evolved. Jack began to crave these moments of submission and degradation. He found solace in being reduced to nothing more than a mere object for Tom’s pleasure. And Tom, in turn, reveled in the power he held over his once-revered professor.
But all good things must come to an end. One day, as they were engaged in their depraved ritual, the door to the office suddenly burst open. Jack’s heart stopped as he saw the shocked and horrified faces of several students and faculty members staring at him, helpless and humiliated.

entry.title: Chocolate Cravings
entry.content:
